The video was published on Twitter on Au: 2019, and has been viewed over 150,000 times.
The video shows a man dressed in black b: while Southern Min language can be heard spoken throughout the video.
The caption alongside the video: written in simplified Chinese, claims that gangsters hired by mainland China attacked an unarmed Hong Kong protester with metal bars, warning the public about opposing the Communist party.
The video was actually filmed in Taiwan: as confirmed by a Google reverse image search and news reports from Taiwanese outlets.
